attributes.action: Israel must reverse the latest land grab of 988 acres or face sanctions.
attributes.additional_details: While the West is distracted by events in Ukraine and Iraq, Israel have today carried out yet another land grab in the occupied West Bank. This 988 acres is the biggest such land appropriation for 30 years. It is time that the UK Government stepped up to the plate and imposed sanctions on Israel to put a stop to their illegal settlement policy.
